title: MD
biography: Subhash Gupta is an Indian hepatobiliary-pancreatic surgeon and the chairman of the Max Center of Liver and Biliary Science at Max Healthcare, Saket.
aiSummary: Subhash Gupta is a transplant innovation specialist with an H-index of 110 at Liver Transplant (Faculty). Has been published in Cell Death and Disease, Annals of Surgery, Journal of Earth System Science. Based in India.
